meanings.definition: Find the total of a part of a series of numbers or amounts.
meanings.sent1: I am subtotaling the cost of the groceries I bought.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys subtotaling her expenses at the end of each month.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried subtotaling the number of treats in its bowl.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a calculator, subtotaling every detail of the crime scene.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made subtotaling fun by turning it into a game.

meanings.definition: To calculate the subtotal of a list of items.
meanings.sent1: We will be subtotaling the prices of the items in the shopping cart.
meanings.sent2: The cashier is subtotaling the purchases before adding the tax.
meanings.sent3: The robot was programmed to subtotal the number of items in the warehouse.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a machine, subtotaling the emotions she felt.
meanings.sent5: The accountant was meticulously subtotaling the company's expenses.
